description: Converts 2 sub-bricks of input to a complex-valued dataset

dataset1.title: Input dataset 1
dataset1.description: Input dataset (either as 1 dataset with 2 sub-bricks or 2 separate datasets)

dataset2.title: Input dataset 2
dataset2.description: Second input dataset (optional if 2 sub-bricks in the first dataset)

ri.title: Real and Imaginary parts flag
ri.description: Specify that the 2 inputs are real and imaginary parts [this is the default]

mp.title: Magnitude and Phase flag
mp.description: Specify that the 2 inputs are magnitude and phase [phase is in radians]

mask.title: Mask Dataset
mask.description: Only output nonzero values where the mask dataset is nonzero
